dict.acceptation: 故事，传说；历史，沿革；内情；传记；
用历史故事画装饰；讲…的故事；把…作为故事讲述；

sent.orig: So the developers meet up in pairs, and each pair chooses a story to work on.
sent.trans: 开发者召开开发会议了，选择一个story来开始写代码。

sent.orig: The humorous story is American, the comic story is English, the witty story is French.
sent.trans: 幽默故事是美国产，喜剧故事是英国产，机智故事是法国产。

sent.orig: Through service, I found that my own story fit into a larger American story.
sent.trans: 通过服务，我发现我个人的故事融入了更宏大的美国故事。

sent.orig: Behind each beautiful fur is an ugly story. it is a brutal, bloody story.
sent.trans: 每块美丽的皮毛背后，都有一个丑陋的故事：残忍野蛮、鲜血淋漓、粗俗至极。

sent.orig: The story teller stretched the story out.
sent.trans: 讲故事的人把故事拖长了。
